channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Millennial CEO reveals ‘the most honest’ time-off request from his Gen Z employee: ‘I just had a breakup… I need a short break’
item.description: The boss approved the request without question, but concluded: “Gen Z doesn’t do filters!”

item.title: Trump appears to jab defeated Republicans, saying it's 'easy' to win elections 'when you talk about the facts'

item.title: What Zohran Mamdani’s Policies Will Do to New York
item.description: The mayor-elect has a terrible proposal for just about every problem the city faces.

item.title: Gallup poll finds record-high optimism about war on drugs
item.description: Record-high shares of Americans believe the country has made progress in the war on drugs, according to the latest Gallup polling released Wednesday.
